UnitDefinition.Name: Risk characterisation ratio
UnitDefinition.Description: The form of the ratio for expressing risk based on an exposure estimate and a hazard threshold value. This can be either exposure/hazard or hazard/exposure.

Unit.Name: hazard/exposure
Unit.Description: Express risk as the ratio hazard/exposure (e.g., MOE(T)).

Unit.Name: exposure/hazard
Unit.Description: Express risk as the ratio exposure/hazard (e.g., HI,HQ, RPI).
